import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Invoices = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState("Hello World"); const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([ { _id: "asdjnsa57", customer_name: "John", customer_surname: "Doe", date: new Date(), }, { _id: "asdjnsa57", customer_name: "John", customer_surname: "Doe", date: new Date(), }, { _id: "asdjnsa57", customer_name: "John", customer_surname: "Doe", date: new Date(), }, ]); useEffect(() => { document.title = "Khamco Shop Home"; }, []); return ( <>
New Invoice

{message}

Invoices

{invoices.length > 0 ? ( invoices.map((invoice, index) => (

Name: {invoice.customer_name} {invoice.customer_surname}

Last Measurement:{" "} {invoice.date.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", })}

View
)) ) : (

No invoice data.

)}
); }; export default Invoices;
